General.Name: Chengdu Xiling Power Science & Technology Incorporated Co Class A
General.Description: Chengdu Xiling Power Science & Technology Incorporated Company produces and sells automotive engine components for high-tech enterprises in China. The company offers camshafts, crankshaft torsional shock absorber, connecting rod assembly, camshaft assembly and turbocharger, damper pulleys, connecting rods, and casting and forging parts. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Chengdu, China.
